tha-ap72:0.3_0: Hermits himself with the old jackals, and the senior monks.
tha-ap72:10.1_0: The seventh sub-chapter on Sakyans is finished.
tha-ap72:13.2_0: with flowers, and your wrap garments.
tha-ap72:13.4_0: The courtesan, too, taught the Dhamma.
tha-ap72:2.1_0: Sikhī, go for refuge to that farmer,
tha-ap72:2.4_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
tha-ap72:3.4_0: I realized the best of Buddha.
tha-ap72:4.4_0: having left victory and defeat behind.
tha-ap72:5.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap72:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap72:6.2_0: we are a disciple of the gods.
tha-ap72:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap72:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kaṅkṭikā.
tha-ap72:9.1_0: The tenth flowers of flax flowers.
